price: 44.Wonna hinnay ama koros kee ken abbobti hatkisneh, maaluu kee xaylooy, qumri xexxar keenih neceemih sabbatah.Diggah Nanu ken baaxót namaateeh, tet derfaafik daggosnam mayablaanaa? Woo baaxooxah mari islaamaninnot aban culimil, maysó-le keeninnaa? Aleey, Nabii kee kay kataysiisi iisá lem.
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿnā hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā ṭāla ʿalayhimu al-ʿumuru afalā yarawna annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā afahumu al-ghālibūna
